properties.title: La Maison Cailler
properties.abstract: Most of us, at some time or another, have dreamt of visiting a chocolate factory. Discover the wonderful world of chocolate at the production facility of renowned chocolate maker, Cailler of Switzerland (Nestlé), in Broc.
properties.description:
An interactive tour takes you directly to the factory floor, where you can see for yourself how chocolate is made. The tour also traces the history of the Broc production site from 1898 right up to the present day.

Visitors are then taken to the gallery area, where they will discover more interesting facts about La Maison Cailler, before delving into the history of chocolate and the cocoa bean. The culmination of the tour is the Cailler Show, which traces the origins of chocolate, the early days of the factory and the history of the Maison Cailler. A veritable sound and light spectacular, the show takes the viewer on a magical journey through the tantalizing world of chocolate.

At the end of the tour, visitors will have the chance to sample Cailler’s most iconic products. Opportunities to buy some delicious Cailler chocolate are available at the factory café and shop.
